targets.target: select count(id),max(created_at) from appinfo where application_name='$Application'
select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')

targets.query: SELECT count("Pipeline_Name") FROM "Build_Info" WHERE "Application_Name" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "Build_status" =~ /.*SUCCESS.*/ AND $timeFilter
targets.target: select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where buildstatus='SUCCESS' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')

targets.query: SELECT count("Pipeline_Name") FROM "Build_Info" WHERE "Application_Name" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "Build_status" =~ /.*FAILURE.*/ AND $timeFilter
targets.target: select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where buildstatus='FAILURE' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')
select round(avg(score),2),max(created_at) from buildinfo where appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name ='$Application')
select lastmodifiedby as Developer,count(*) as commits_per_pipeline from scminfo group by appid,lastmodifiedby having appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')
select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename='SCM' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')
select buildtime,created_at from buildinfo where stagename='SCM'  and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')

targets.query: SELECT count("Application_Name") FROM "Build_Info" WHERE "Application_Name" =~ /.*$Application.*/ AND "Stage_Name" =~ /.*SCM.*/ AND "Build_status" !~ /.*SUCCESS.*/
targets.target: select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename='SCM' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application') and buildstatus='FAILURE'

targets.query: SELECT count("Application_Name") FROM "Build_Info" WHERE "Application_Name" =~ /.*$Application.*/ AND "Stage_Name" =~ /.*SCM.*/ AND "Build_status" =~ /.*SUCCESS.*/
targets.target: select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename='SCM' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application') and buildstatus='SUCCESS'
select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename='Build' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')
select buildtime,created_at,buildtime from buildinfo where stagename='Build'  and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')

targets.query: SELECT count("Application_Name") FROM "Build_Info" WHERE "Application_Name" =~ /.*$Application.*/ AND "Stage_Name" =~ /.*Build.*/ AND "Build_status" !~ /.*SUCCESS.*/
targets.target: select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename='Build' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application') and buildstatus='FAILURE'

targets.query: SELECT count("Application_Name") FROM "Build_Info" WHERE "Application_Name" =~ /.*$Application.*/ AND "Stage_Name" =~ /.*Build.*/ AND "Build_status" =~ /.*SUCCESS.*/
targets.target: select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename='Build' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application') and buildstatus='SUCCESS'
select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename like '%Test%' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')
select buildtime,created_at from buildinfo where stagename like '%Test%'  and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application' order by appid desc)

targets.query: SELECT count("Application_Name") FROM "Build_Info" WHERE "Application_Name" =~ /.*$Application.*/ AND "Stage_Name" =~ /.*Test.*/ AND "Build_status" !~ /.*SUCCESS.*/
targets.target: select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename like '%Test%' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application') and buildstatus='FAILURE'

targets.query: SELECT count("Application_Name") FROM "Build_Info" WHERE "Application_Name" =~ /.*$Application.*/ AND "Stage_Name" =~ /.*Test.*/ AND "Build_status" =~ /.*SUCCESS.*/
targets.target: select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename like '%Test%' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application') and buildstatus!='FAILURE'
select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename like '%Deploy%' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')
select buildtime,created_at,buildtime from buildinfo where stagename like '%Deploy%'  and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application')

targets.query: SELECT count("Application_Name") FROM "Build_Info" WHERE "Application_Name" =~ /.*$Application.*/ AND "Stage_Name" =~ /.*Deploy.*/ AND "Build_status" =~ /.*SUCCESS.*/
targets.target: select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename like '%Deploy%' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application') and buildstatus='SUCCESS'

targets.query: SELECT count("Application_Name") FROM "Build_Info" WHERE "Application_Name" =~ /.*$Application.*/ AND "Stage_Name" =~ /.*Deploy.*/ AND "Build_status" !~ /.*SUCCESS.*/
targets.target: select count(appid),max(created_at) from buildinfo where stagename like '%Deploy%' and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application') and buildstatus='FAILURE'

SELECT count(*),max(created_at) from buildinfo where  DATE_PART('day',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::timestamp-created_at::timestamp )<=7 and appid in (select id from appinfo where application_name='$Application') and stagename like '%Deploy%'
